meanings.sent1: The nonpermissive teacher did not let the students leave the classroom without permission.
meanings.sent2: The nonpermissive rules stated that no one could enter the building without a pass.
meanings.sent3: The nonpermissive librarian refused to let anyone borrow books without a library card.
meanings.sent4: The nonpermissive security guard stood firm, denying entry to those without proper identification.
meanings.sent5: The nonpermissive gatekeeper guarded the entrance, only allowing authorized personnel to pass through.

meanings.sent1: The nonpermissive parent did not allow their child to attend the party.
meanings.sent2: The nonpermissive manager rejected the proposal without considering it.
meanings.sent3: The nonpermissive cat refused to let the dog play with its toys.
meanings.sent4: The nonpermissive landlord prohibited any alterations to the rental property.
meanings.sent5: The nonpermissive boss denied all requests for time off, making the employees frustrated.
